events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I am not satisfied with it and would like to request a refund. The product does not meet my expectations.
The reported case has been categorized as a refund request based on customer message mentioning 'refund' and dissatisfaction with the product.
This case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in refunds to assist with the refund process promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please share your order number and the reason for the refund?
Please provide your order number along with details about why you wish to return the jacket to help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is too small and the material feels rough. I am not comfortable keeping it and would like to return it for a refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a return shipping label to your email shortly. Once we receive the jacket, a full refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thank you for your quick response and solution. I appreciate the assistance and will send the jacket back as soon as I receive the return label.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the refunded amount reflect in your bank account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund successfully and if there's anything else we can assist you with.
As we have confirmed your refund has been processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting our support.
